panels.description: Host of BigBlueButton.
panels.title: BBB Host

panels.description: Boolean value which indicates if API is responding. The result 1 (true) designates successful API response.
panels.title: BBB API

panels.description: BigBlueButton Exporter version.
panels.title: BigBlueButton Exporter Version

panels.description: Start time of the process since unix epoch in seconds.
panels.title: Process start time

panels.description: Maximum number of participants within the last week and since start of system.
panels.title: Max participants

panels.description:
Total participants: Total number of participants in all BigBlueButton meetings.

Listeners: Total number of listeners in all BigBlueButton meetings.

Voice participants: Total number of voice participants in all BigBlueButton meetings.

Video participants: Total number of video participants in all BigBlueButton meetings.
panels.title: Type of participants

panels.description: Total number of participants in all BigBlueButton meetings by client.
panels.title: Participants by Client Type

panels.description:
Processing: Total number of BigBlueButton recordings processing.

Published: Total number of BigBlueButton recordings published.

Unpublished: Total number of BigBlueButton recordings unpublished.

Deleted: Total number of BigBlueButton recordings deleted.
panels.title: Recordings

panels.description: Number of meeting rooms.
panels.title: Number of Rooms

panels.description: Buckets (Y axis) represents the number of participants while the count in each bucket represents the number of rooms with that particular bucket's value.
panels.title: Heatmap of Room Participants

panels.description: Buckets (Y axis) represents the number of video participants while the count in each bucket represents the number of rooms with that particular bucket's value.
panels.title: Heatmap of Video Participants

panels.description: Buckets (Y axis) represents the number of voice participants while the count in each bucket represents the number of rooms with that particular bucket's value.
panels.title: Heatmap of Voice Participants

panels.description: Buckets (Y axis) represents the number of listeners while the count in each bucket represents the number of rooms with that particular bucket's value.
panels.title: Heatmap of Listeners Participants

panels.description: BigBlueButton API call latency.
panels.title: Exporter Metrics Response Time (95th Percentile)

panels.description: Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Virtual memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Virtual memory size

panels.description: Resident memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Resident memory

panels.description: Number of times each generation was collected.
panels.title: Python garbage collector collections

panels.description:
Collected: Objects collected during garbage collection.

Uncollectable: Uncollectable object found during garbage collection.
panels.title: Python garbage collector objects

panels.description:
File descriptors: Number of open file descriptors.

panels.title: Open file descriptors
